abstracts.cdata!:
The project would consist of four
            independent sub-projects, each with its own storage dam and
            irrigation and drainage network. Other works would include:
            land consolidation and on-farm development for 30,000
            hectares; relocation of existing roads in the reservoir
            areas and improvements of secondary and farm service roads
            in the project area; and a primary line application on all
            lands following on-farm development. In addition,
            consultants would prepare a feasibility study for a second
            stage project in the river basin.
